name: Clicker App Document
summary: Learn about .CADOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Clicker program offers several writing features such as the ability to receive spelling suggestions that can be illustrated and spoken, receive word predictions based on what is typed, hear text spoken in realistic voices, and record initial thoughts and ideas before writing.

description: A CADOC file is a document created by Clicker, a literacy tool that allows teachers to create customized curriculum resources. The file contains text, images, and recorded voice notes.
